text: When creating a module locally how do you add style options?

When working locally is there anyway to use variables in the `module.css`? I want to keep my module css local, so just when the module is used so I like keeping it inside the module. But is there no ways to use SCSS for them
if you don’t need to support IE (or just have a decent fallback option) use CSS variables: <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/Using_CSS_custom_properties>
